schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts lightning fast and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the highway between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: At 9.30 p.m., a 44-year-old driver wanted to turn left with her VW coming from Merklingen onto Landesstraße 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: She overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist coming from the direction of Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: Hand and foot brake levers fly away during collision
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker still tried to avoid the car, but still grazed it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: Due to the grazing process, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mindful, he steered his motorcycle into the green stiffener next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker nevertheless suffered an injury to Bei and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvest workers infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a Corona mass infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the curfew.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvest workers tested positive for the Corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the screening, as the Dingolfing-Landau district office announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "In order to avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population," explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already been infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers are only for jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with a good 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to remain calm: "According to our information, this is a closed group of people".
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected employees were separated from uninfected employees, and the area is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and SPD gave the state government co-responsibility.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting to control the accommodation of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can take bitter revenge if such local infection events spread and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary managing director of the Green Party.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a very similar view: "After the Corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control program for farms with harvest workers," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "From our point of view, hygiene conditions at the workplace and living conditions in particular must be tightly controlled.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: U-Bahn station Aidenbachstraße: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after Schubser
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: During a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a push and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday, around 4.15 p.m., there was a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passerby alerted the police, who arrived with several patrols.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a Munich resident (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slid over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped the fallen climb out of the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger of an incoming train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were again clashes between the two people.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the crime scene, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: ACcompanied by his father, he went to the police inspection 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is under investigation for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: However, according to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer is calling for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for extended data retention - half a year instead of the planned ten weeks.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As reported by "Bild am Sonntag," Seehofer asked Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer therefore wants to strengthen measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He believes it makes sense to "make urgently needed adjustments to the law now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision of the ECJ is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the changes beforehand so that they could be applied immediately after a possible positive judgment, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesman for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it could only be meaningfully examined whether legal adjustments were needed once the courts had decided.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the federal states, had already spoken out in June in favour of data retention.
bild.255016.1: NBA: strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), basketball pro of the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarter in Disney World in Orlando/Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN, is back in isolation, is tested daily on Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for the visit: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year, "Sweet Lou," as he is called in the NBA, already expressed his love for these very wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta, ed.) have the best wings in the city".
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA has ordered Williams to be quarantined for ten days.
bild.255016.10: The Clippers star thus misses the first two official games after the test phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to finish the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: The best 22 teams are currently preparing for the season finale starting on Friday night with training matches.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on the Corona situation after mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) announced a Testoffesive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has alarmed authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvest workers from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have become infected with the corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is cordoned off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: Nobody is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free Corona tests to the community's 3,300 residents.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvest workers had little contact with the local population, the district office has so far assumed that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Conscience": Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has been cooperative," lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defence lawyer added: "He regrets the actions very much, the confession was a relief for him".
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and very affected by the extent of the destruction".
kurier.at.204625.5: According to the prosecutor's office, if convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic St. Peter and Paul Cathedral in Nantes was severely damaged in a fire on Saturday night last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire had broken out in three places far apart in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The now arrested suspect had already been arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: He was released after a day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came into the focus of investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discuss the abolition of the 50+1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended considering abolishing the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli," Grindel told Bild am Sonntag.
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous to Bayern and Dortmund, the 50+1 rules do not work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, one cannot avoid the debate as to whether it is not necessary to facilitate the involvement of investors for clubs that want to break into this phalanx".
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he had doubts as to whether there was a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority participations, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to build investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a European internal market," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that "the attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more tension in the championship".
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV funds will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern has a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences among the first three clubs alone are immense.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million," explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there were people who noticed this mistake and stabbed the press instead of asking me about it," said Grindel about the acceptance of an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "That has kept me very busy on a human level".
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift, worth around 11,000 euros, from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation, and it was right to draw the consequences," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and unsuspectingly.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many in the DFB knew about it".
infranken.de.309597.20: He had never "made a secret of the gift," the 58-year-old assured.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naive, at least this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption".
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": Injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: The protests against police violence in the United States have escalated again due to Donald Trump's deployment of federal police officers in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday there were clashes between demonstrators and police in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was shot dead while a demonstrator was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously, there had again been clashes in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas on Saturday night and violently dispersed demonstrators.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of demonstrators, some armed, marched through Louisville, Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in March during a drug raid in her apartment in Louisville.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: Three people were injured on Saturday when a member of a group calling itself an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators of a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, a person was shot and killed during a Black Lives Matter demonstration.
faz.79601.17: The police reportedly took a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: She has not yet provided any further information on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: According to the New York Times, Mayor Steve Adler said that, like many in the city, he was "inconsolable and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Demonstrators also clashed with the police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction vehicles in front of a juvenile prison, and the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or assault.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of demonstrators smashed windows, fired fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police reported late Saturday evening (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver, Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: According to the police, one of the demonstrators fired a gun and at least one person was taken to hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: Windows were also smashed in a court and a fire was set, according to the police.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big party was missing in the spa town, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: the Rakoczy weekend without the Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale burns, Rakoczy ball or procession, many got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when only the historical were the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser and her husband have been visiting Bad Kissingen for the Rakoczy festival for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: So also this time in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple has made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watching the historical while strolling and listening to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it quite pleasant," says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But it lacks the usual program highlights, especially Saale burns on Friday evening as well as the historic procession and the final fireworks display on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year," she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy equestrian tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example for Christina Gold, who takes part in the procession in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgartencafé.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she was walking around the city in costume on Saturdays and Sundays.
infranken.de.309607.21: "It's more strenuous, otherwise it's easier for us," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The equestrian club had less to do, even if individual riders were out and about in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the rider quadrille can take place again next year," says the chairman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy equestrian tournament will take place again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases at Spanish second division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish football second division team CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper and deeper into the crisis due to a Corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to the city of A Coruña for a game on July 20 despite the first Corona cases, one low blow follows the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, and one was hospitalized, the club said.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name south-west of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now even the relegation to the B-group of the Second League threatens.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was cancelled at the last moment, the public prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, the highest sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players and other team members are in quarantine in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel or gel," wrote the sports newspaper "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show how players hung up underwear and club clothes to dry in their rooms in the hotel after apparently having to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: The bed linen was also not changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It is neither good nor sufficient, wrote "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The accusation of intentionally endangering public health was rejected by the club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: Javier Tebas, son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, stressed that the Corona rules established by the Football Association had not been violated, as reported by the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca".
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there had been four infected people by 19 July, but all of them were isolated and did not travel with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Directly before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, the Corona test was positive for "five or six" other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was cancelled 60 minutes before kickoff, said Tebas Llanas.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police must catch runaway horses at Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police led her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning, shortly before 6 o'clock, a road user informed two free-running horses on the feeder between the junction Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld and the motorway junction Theres.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were already between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the trust of the horses could be won by the officers shortly before Dampfach, they each had a rope carried in the patrol car put on.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career continuation conceivable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt/Main - The seven-time time trial world champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently working with the team to define the framework conditions for how and in what form things could continue," the 35-year-old told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung".
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: Negotiations with his team were also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or about other problems that would plague him as a family man, said Martin.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and the first thought was: "Quickly get back on the bike.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think: what if".
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are certainly aspects with which he is finding it increasingly difficult.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it was good for me to realize from the Corona time what I have in cycling and how much I enjoy it".
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist will return to competition at the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on the streets of Bavaria at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the tour by motorcycle ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - Several, mostly young people died in accidents on Bavaria's roads over the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: On Saturday, an 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit by a car in the opposite lane near Schönthal (district of Cham).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car got into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his machine on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was going downhill near Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, according to the police.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: An 18-year-old died in another fatal accident in Bad Kötzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a road on Sunday night and was run over by a 42-year-old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver could no longer brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: Near Schönberg (county of Freyung-Grafenau), a 57-year-old biker crashed head-on into a car in a right turn on Saturday despite full braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, the remaining three people in the car were uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Transport Minister Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underride protection on guardrails and the mitigation of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "We have achieved a lot for the safety of motorcyclists in recent years," the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorized two-wheelers killed decreased by around 28 percent compared to 2011".
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Football coach Niko Kovac will soon have a reunion with Eintracht Frankfurt with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will make a guest appearance on 1 August (6 p.m.) at the Hessen, the former club of the Croat.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: This is the first and only endurance test for the Bundesliga team before the return leg in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the match will be held without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We are especially looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends," explained Kovac.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: In terms of sport, this is an interesting test, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before his move to FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached Hessen from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB-Pokal.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us with regard to the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like everyone in Frankfurt, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again," said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croat at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, Frankfurt lost the first round match against Basel 0-3 in their own stadium.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Almost 50 new infections: County of Hof just past the lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the district of Hof, the number of known new Corona infections continued to increase at the weekend: from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in these statistics) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: There is also a case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: The Hof area is thus approaching the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 Dead due to monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: Severe floods in Southeast Asia have affected more than 9 million people, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: A total of 700 people lost their lives due to the heavy monsoon rains.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.

euronews-de.199228.8: In Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 tank rhinos died in landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are protected and considered endangered.

euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the village of Cox's Bazar in southern Bangladesh, the state has built homes for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far, only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: Getting people to Cox's Bazar is difficult.
euronews-de.199228.16: The enthusiasm also persists in Grenezn.
euronews-de.199228.17: Those who used to have a house, no matter how small it was and resembled a hut, often do not want to spend their lives in a large apartment block.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments are empty, but - according to the government - will soon be occupied by those who have lost their homes due to the floods.
oe24.at.258757.1: 60 New Corona infections in just one day in Vienna

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "That would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair," it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors".
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: Argentina is therefore demanding that its private creditors waive part of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is again threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Lenders had recently demanded higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its latest offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is experiencing a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate has recently been more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts expect economic power to decline by around ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had not settled interest claims amounting to 503 million US dollars and had thus slipped into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.2: "It's going super well" - this is the conclusion Dr. Stefanie Kramer draws after her first days at the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she would succeed Lutz Feller in the Eggenfelden notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law began work, and normal day-to-day business has long been in full swing.
pnp.de.390078.5: "However, I still have to arrive privately," she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to completely relocate the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native of Dingolfing.
pnp.de.390078.7: She and her husband, who works as a judge at the regional court in Regensburg, are currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to ensure the care of the two daughters (31⁄2 and 11⁄2 years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute from Regensburg every day, she also has overnight accommodation with her parents in Dingolfing, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighbouring district, the city of Eggenfelden has of course long been known to her.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits on site with her family in recent months, she once again stated: "Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town".
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had won the race for the vacancy in the selection process.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her native Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: after studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship and the second state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as Notarassesorin, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in Unterallgäu and Regensburg - during this time she also shouldered her doctorate in labour law "by the way" - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she took parental leave, eventually moving to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken on representative services in various notary offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for a full professional return, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: Dr. Stefanie Kramer has completely taken over the team of her predecessor, who will take over the holiday substitute in the notary's office in the future - and immediately has praise for the law firm's team: "It's going super well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-established processes here makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private center of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: In terms of kindergarten and crèche places, she has already contacted a local institution.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything works out as desired, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent full at the start of the season if fans return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulation, which must be adhered to, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators," Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told the "Tagesspiegel".
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds just over 81,000 spectators for Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: BVB lost around four million euros per game in last season's ghost games caused by the Corona pandemic.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitization and internationalization at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality area can also be opened again: "It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues completely collapse".
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing Corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable side first".
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are working short-time, then the need for entertainment is limited," explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The head of marketing in Dortmund praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which should contribute to overcoming the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work".
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: an early start to life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a pack of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: that was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the Graz Children's Hospital.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extremely lightweights with less than a kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully formed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so delicate that they could hurt the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers specially made for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they are not in voice - "and how," smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if of course they don't scream quite as loud as big babies".
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona Theater in the classroom: The 9th graders of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd experienced the whiteboard as a stage shortly before the holiday began.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the production "Das Heimatkleid" to the students - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the students were able to discuss the play and the performance with the actress and the director Winfried Tobias via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born from the current Corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was pleased about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even though all participants agreed at the end that the direct encounter in the theater and stage space would offer additional attractions, one also sees the potential for contact with schools in the theater.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we further improve the technical framework, this could be an interesting addition to the game operation," said director Winfried Tobias.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.1: First round draw: TSV 1860 would face Eintracht Frankfurt in the DFB-Pokal
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: Should TSV 1860 qualify for the DFB-Pokal, the Lions will face Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This was the result of the draw on Sunday.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.4: Munich - Sixty possible opponent in the first round of the DFB-Pokal has been determined.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.5: The Lions would face Eintracht Frankfurt in a successful qualification.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.6: This was the result of the draw on Sunday evening in the ARD Sportschau.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.7: Because the field of participants is not yet complete due to the Corona pandemic, placeholders were used in the draw.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.8: Due to the voluntary renunciation of semi-final opponent FC Memmingen, TSV 1860 is already in the final of the Bavarian Toto Cup (4 or 5 September).
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.9: There the Lions will face either Würzburger Kickers or Viktoria Aschaffenburg.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.10: Should Würzburg reach the final, Sixty would already have qualified for the first round of the DFB-Pokal.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.11: Otherwise, the Giesinger would have to prevail in the final against Regionalliga side Aschaffenburg.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.12: The first round of the DFB-Pokal will be held between 11 and 14 September, one week before the start of the third division.
mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone With the Wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes in Paris on Sunday at the age of 104, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theater man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia of Shakespeare's "A Midsummer Night's Dream".
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and brought her out big alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the Heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the leading role of "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was shown in Germany under the title "Motherheart".
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for best actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress".
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit".
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier proposed her in 1952 for the leading role in the film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel".
mz-web.de.376296.14: The play became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her longtime friend Bette Davis she played in "Lullaby for a Corpse".
mz-web.de.376296.16: The marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953) produced the son Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath were never confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole/Wickler miss final at comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: World Cup runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final of the beach volleyball tournament "Road to Timmendorf".
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Düsseldorf, they lost in the semifinals to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Flüggen 1:2 (17:21, 21:17, 19:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Thole/Wickler last played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine, their defeaters Ehlers/Flüggen conceded a defeat against the surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde 0-2 (17:21, 17:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German championships were played in Timmendorfer Strand at the beginning of September: tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger/Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms/Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner/Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz ejection from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "fig leaf"
paz-online.de.95211.2: The exclusion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is from the point of view of the FDP only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the extreme right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of radicals in the AfD," FDP domestic politician Benjamin Strasser told the news agency dpa in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed the exclusion of Kalbitz on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of hearing, which the federal executive board had decided by a majority in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from their party, functionaries like Björn Höcke and his supporters would have been expelled long ago," Strasser said.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will for this in the AfD, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party".
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume expressed a similar opinion: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and does not change anything," he told the "Welt am Sonntag".
paz-online.de.95211.10: "It speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist still has in the middle of the AfD".
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will again end up below five percent in elections in the future.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are numbered".
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the now officially dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group chairman Björn Höcke; the Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution classifies the Strönung as a "secured right-wing extremist effort".
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive threw Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason, he stated that Kalbitz had not indicated an earlier membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimatreun Deutschen Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the Left faction in the Brandenburg Landtag, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court did not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf only ate chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, with or without Kalbitz".
paz-online.de.95211.19: This decision will neither weaken the federal party nor the right wing.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The maneuver of the Meuthen troops is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the secret service and try to get through under the radar," said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD cannot get rid of the spirits it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: An expulsion does not change anything," commented the Brandenburg SPD General Secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here the AfD regional association and the faction remained their right-wing leader to this day".
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms supply a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period of the previous year, according to the grid operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for the transmission of North Sea electricity to the mainland and the transmission through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Altogether, wind power from the North and Baltic Seas thus comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of total wind power in Germany, which is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: By 2030, it is expected to rise to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we will invest 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then," said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind farms cannot exhaust their capacity even at sea, but reach around 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is 2 January, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, North Sea wind turbines produce around 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition of the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmünder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: It was almost a small anniversary celebration for the 130th anniversary.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gmünder Kunstverein: The exhibition opening "Skirmish" with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold went beyond the usual scope after the Corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery, the association "Sandtogether" was involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windberg Festival cancelled due to Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, more than 30,000 people had visited this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute," explained Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (independent).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But ultimately, as organizers, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people".
dnn-online.de.39567.7: If tens of thousands had flocked to the festival grounds and the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current Corona Protection Regulation could not have been complied with.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so severe that there would not have been much left of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: Moreover, the organisational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately many times over.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg put off for next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: The city of Freital will then celebrate its 100th anniversary with the Winter Mountain Festival from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Olympic Dressage Champion Werth unbeatable in Achleiten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - The six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg scored four victories in four starts this weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning a Grand Prix at the start with Weihegold and Quantaz, she was also unbeatable on Sunday in the Grand Prix Special and in the freestyle.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold Werth clearly prevailed on Sunday in the special against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: The German was also clearly ahead of her 34-year-old student Victoria Max-Theurer in the freestyle on Quantaz on Saturday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Werth had already won all four important tests at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled for August 14-16.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in the future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: Worms University of Applied Sciences continues to take to the skies: "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" is donating a professorship for "Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: With the professorship, it is possible to start studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and the DFS air traffic control academy are equally utilized.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on the establishment and appointment of the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester 2019, the first students have been studying Air Traffic Management as part of their training as air traffic controllers at Worms University of Applied Sciences.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: DFS' experience so far has been very positive and the students' performance has been excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training contributes significantly to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to continue fulfilling our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel," said Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman of the Managing Director of DFS when signing the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proofing investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing the good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpinning our attractiveness as an employer".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of Worms University of Applied Sciences: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and business.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With her, we would like to build on the existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's program Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of German air traffic control is both a motivation and an obligation for Worms University of Applied Sciences to further expand its teaching and research competence in the future fields of aviation.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: Working for the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative priorities for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary in the Ministry of Science, Continuing Education and Culture, emphasizes: "With its focus on aviation, Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling proposition in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the profile of the university".
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue helicopter lands on the A 45
main-netz.de.61826.2: The A 45 motorway was fully closed for about 30 minutes on Saturday afternoon in the direction of Aschaffenburg, as the rescue helicopter was in use after a traffic accident.
main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-year-old drove a Ford straight ahead in the curve at 12.40 p.m. at the Alzenau-Mitte exit and landed at the guardrail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The impact triggered the front airbags, the driver suffered minor injuries to his face and had to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The injuries of the 72-year-old passenger were treated by the emergency doctor and the patient was then flown to a hospital by rescue helicopter.
main-netz.de.61826.6: At present, however, the police assume that there is no mortal danger.
main-netz.de.61826.7: The damaged vehicle, which suffered damage of about 2,000 euros, had to be towed.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to examine other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The Corona crisis brought the conditions in parts of the meat industry back to light.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.3: Tightening of the law is imminent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they right - and will it stay that way?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Minister of Labour Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to review other sectors after the now planned strict regulations against grievances in the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for the respective industry if necessary," Heil told the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the mass Corona outbreak at the meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law of salvation this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to use external personnel for slaughter, dismantling and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: For this purpose, the use of contract and temporary workers is to be prohibited there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer president Ingo Kramer told the dpa: "Hands off a general restriction on work contracts and temporary employment if you do not want to completely stifle the economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Work contracts, for example, are the basis for customer value creation for large areas of crafts, the construction industry and plant engineering.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The misdeeds of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: "My goal is not to ban work contracts everywhere in the German economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "If an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a safety system, that is a normal work contract".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary work in its industry alone to be unconstitutional.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It cannot be explained why different labour law should apply to portioning and packaging cheese in the future than to sausage, according to a statement on the proposed law, as reported by the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung" (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: In the event of a ban, the consumer price would rise by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW Occupational Safety and Health Administration, many Eastern European employees from contract companies sometimes worked 16 hours a day in the industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also noted that the situation regarding the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively strict law had already come into force for the meat industry in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were circumvented by "tricky constructions".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now we have to clean up fundamentally".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: "The Occupational Safety and Health Act, which we intend to adopt in the cabinet at the end of July, also includes measures that do not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher inspection rates for occupational safety or clear criteria for community accommodation".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft submitted to dpa includes amendments to the Act on the Protection of Workers' Rights in the Meat Industry and the Occupational Safety and Health Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) considers more intensive controls necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to carry out even more controls in many supervisory areas: food controls, animal welfare, everything possible, for example animal transport," said Nonnemacher on Sunday in the RBB program "Brandenburg aktuell".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: However, more staff positions are also needed for more controls.
tt.com.148707.1: Three dead in crash of ultralight aircraft in Germany

tt.com.148707.4: Two more people were rescued injured in the accident, said a spokesman for the Wesel district control center.
