rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Eviction of Frankfurt Opernplatz proceeds peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: One week after the riots in Frankfurt, the evacuation of the Opernplatz in the night to Sunday was also peaceful.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: Finally, several dozen people were still in the square, but left before the curfew began at 1 o'clock.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had been on duty with numerous officers since the early evening, and a larger police force could be seen throughout the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: For the first time this weekend from midnight, there was a ban on entering the Opernplatz, where there had been riots a week ago.
rundschau-online.de.151934.6: Policemen had been attacked with bottles from the crowd of revelers.
rundschau-online.de.151934.7: At least five officers were injured and several police vehicles were damaged.
rundschau-online.de.151934.8: The night to Saturday had also remained quiet.
hna.de.247362.1: Car rolls over: young woman seriously injured in an accident on Bundesstraße 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: A 21-year-old suffered serious injuries in an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme at around 1.25 p.m. on Sunday.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to the Kassel hospital.
hna.de.247362.4: The fire brigade used thermal imaging cameras to search for possible passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was driving on Bundesstraße 83 in the direction of her home in Hümme when her car left the road for unknown reasons and rolled over several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the victim, the fire brigade had to cut the roof of the car free.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether anyone was still in the vehicle, the adjacent corn field was searched from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, had also been ordered to search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the volunteers did not find anyone between the tall maize plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured were taken by ambulance to the Kassel hospital for further care.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 firefighters from the Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg fire brigade were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The highway was closed for two hours due to the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a relieving goal by Cristiano Ronaldo, record champion Juventus Turin has secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world footballer made the 36th Scudetto in the club's history perfect with a 2:0 (1:0) on Sunday evening in the home game against Sampdoria Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Turin, which competed without the recently long-injured ex-national Sami Khedira, can no longer be ousted from first place two match days before the end of the Serie A season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: The second-placed Inter Milan is seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus was harmless despite optical superiority in the first half, then Ronaldo scored after a free kick variant with the last action.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old used a pass from Miralem Pjanic directly from the penalty area with a flat shot (45.+7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Ronaldo was also involved in the 2-0 against the now more offensive guests, after his shot Federico Bernardeschi (67th) dusted off.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This secured the lackluster, but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The foul penalty shot to the bar in the 89th minute should only have really hurt Ronaldo himself with regard to the goal scorer rating.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: "It is complicated to stay at ball level mentally and physically for 90 minutes.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange, and the momentum changes very easily," explained coach Maurizio Sarri after the 1:2 at Udinese Calcio on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Above all, the mental exhaustion of his players is great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Due to the defeat, the Turin team had not yet been able to make the championship perfect.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: Juve's reassuring lead at the top of the standings was mainly due to the weakness of its competitors.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: In the eleven games before the game on Sunday, the Sarri team had only managed five victories.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: Whether Ronaldo will also be the top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: While the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, the former Dortmunder Ciro Immobile has already scored 34 goals after his three-pack in the 5:1 (1:1) of fourth-placed Lazio Rome at Hellas Verona - as many as Robert Lewandowski contributed to FC Bayern's title win.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The record in Italy is held by the current Juve professional Gonzalo Higuaín.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentine scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015/2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: In August, the next title chance awaits the "Old Lady" of Italian football.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus is in the second round of the Champions League, but has to make up for a 0-1 first leg bankruptcy against Olympique Lyon on 7 August to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: In the next knockout round Real Madrid or Manchester City would be waiting as opponents.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: More than 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all threatened penalties and court rulings, drivers continue to step on the gas in countless illegal races on the roads of Baden-Württemberg: Last year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparative values for the years before, but the speeders are increasingly making the judicial authorities work: the public prosecutors between Konstanz and Mannheim conducted a total of 155 preliminary investigations for illegal races in 2018, a year later there were already 252 and in the current year until the beginning of June already 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, as can be seen from the response of the Interior Ministry to a request from the state parliament SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or fled from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: At the wheel were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the speeders caught and also asked to pay: according to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been imposed and 15 prison sentences pronounced since 2018.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other drivers reacted more sensitively than before due to the numerous tragic accidents and trials of past years and reported more frequently, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: The Autobahn 8 is particularly popular with speeders. Again and again, drivers brake the traffic there to make room for themselves and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.13: A81 is the most popular "race track"
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: The police even register more races on the A81 than on any other federal motorway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: With a speed limit, attempts are made to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped-up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers switch to the grass in Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few distances: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would solve this problem on motorways," says Martin Rivoir, the traffic expert of the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you could not legally travel here and there at 200 kilometers per hour and more".
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: "Anyone who disregards all rules in such a way and puts not only their own lives, but also the lives of other road users at risk, is hardly reachable with reason".
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police crackdown
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: For the ADAC, however, this is not enough: "We assume that speeders will not be deterred by the speed limits," says Holger Bach, Head of Transport and Environment at the ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: He calls for additional and tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: It is not uncommon for the high-speed trial of strength to become painful and serious: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people across the country have died in the races, two of them uninvolved in a nightly crash in Stuttgart city center and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have had a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, crashed into a garden wall and remained lying on its side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 Other people have been injured in the races of the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: However, according to Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, stricter penalties are not necessary: "There is no need for legislative action to sanction illegal motor vehicle races more severely," says the Interior Ministry's paper.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light of July 23: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: At around 3.40 a.m., a witness heard noises in the valley road and ran towards the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who helped himself with drinks at the refrigerator and then left the snack bar through a previously smashed entrance door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled towards the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also used a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: he is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: He wore a black hoodie, black trousers and light shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: The police will take further evidence from witnesses.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann won his second victory of the day on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old Palatine from the Bora-hansgrohe team won the 109-kilometer section with start and finish in Sibiu in a mass sprint after winning a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was the season victories three and four for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: His Austrian team mate Gregor Mühlberger won the overall classification.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had confidently won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the classification.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders had lined up for the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No less than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I am really happy to start the new season with a victory," Ackermann explained after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: 300 Meters from the finish line, he simply put on his sprint, "and it worked out perfectly".
pnp.de.390142.12: According to the rules of the UCI, a Corona test was carried out on all race participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, drivers and supervisors were separated from the organizing team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instructions for lay resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire department, the emergency call was received shortly before 1 p.m.
bild.254818.5: "A control center dispatcher immediately gave instructions for lay resuscitation," said a fire department spokesman to BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue forces took over the resuscitation measures a little later.
bild.254818.7: The child, who was in mortal danger, was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started investigating the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire brigade spokesman: "We assume a tragic accident in the apartment".
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unapproved tuning meeting - police intervene, 700 vehicles and around 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times over 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" in the parking lot of a furniture store on Saturday night.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to increase control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A big tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (25 July 2020) in the southern city of Nuremberg.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the police of Middle Franconia, the Nuremberg traffic police detected an increased volume of vehicles in the area of a large car park in Ingolstädter Straße at around 10.30 p.m.
infranken.de.309656.7: The police then carried out a large number of vehicle inspections there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police announced that they wanted to take more action against so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: only a small part of the "scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers counted a good 700 vehicles and about 1100 people at the top, according to the police.
infranken.de.309656.11: However, only a small part of those present can be assigned to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the police's appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: Based on the vehicles and people on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: Moreover, the majority of those present adhered to the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular compliance with the minimum distance and wearing mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed around 1:00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: Altogether, the officials found such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The police headquarters of Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on the events and will continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the emergence of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The agency News5 spoke with Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company involved: "They all have beautiful rims, we must not scratch them," says Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this purpose.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must be careful not to cause any damage.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, young people should get their cars back unscathed".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Employment Agency figures: 900 suspected cases of abuse in short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - According to its own statement, the Federal Employment Agency (BA) is investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time work allowance.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "With more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time work, this is extremely little," said Daniel Terzenbach, the Executive Board member responsible for operational business, to the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When many companies suddenly applied for short-time work at the beginning of the Corona crisis, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: Normally, the examination takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "So much time was not available to us in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will take a closer look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be a lot to follow.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and have staying power".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Evidence of abuse often comes from the employees or trade unions concerned.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to detect patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: Assessments differ, but we are preparing ourselves for the eventuality and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency money".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection was dissolved at 8.48 p.m. by the district drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation informed PNN upon request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people would have played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the Foundation's parks, there are repeated accumulations in which the distance and hygiene rules Covid-19 Bypass Ordinance are not complied with.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with about 300 people in Babelsberg Park, a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a Corona Ordinance, the parks will be closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: Camping on the meadows is prohibited according to park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for some time that visitors are leaving behind more and more garbage and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: Meanwhile, illegal park parties in Berlin have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln, 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was dispersed by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after Corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a Corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: Accordingly, many of those infected are young interns in tourism businesses, but at least one holiday guest tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodation on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations there and there" of bookings, Hans Wieser, head of the Wolfgangsee Tourism Association, told dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around one third of the guests are German.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: The first infections became public knowledge on Friday.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: On Saturday, the head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended the behaviour of the interns, who had celebrated in several restaurants and may have been infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all enjoyed doing that in our youth," he told the radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism association launched an information campaign to sensitize young employees to the dangers of Covid-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: Starting on Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from July 15 were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak evokes memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a center of the Corona spread throughout Europe in the early phase of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: Altogether, more than 1500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The new infections focus on Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (AP) - The English football record champion Manchester United returns to the Champions League after a year of absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the last day of the Premier League with a 2-0 (0-0) victory against direct rival Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to be content with the Europa League, because Chelsea FC passed and also qualified for the premier league in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa was able to cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90th+8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, opponent of FC Bayern in the Champions League's eighth final, won 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45.+1) and Olivier Giroud (45.+4).
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's victory against Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, which passed Wolves with a meager 1:1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace and started sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford FC and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble for a long time at West Ham United for the class retention.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) immediately compensated Andrei Yarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.13: The 1:1 (0:0) was enough, however, because Watford lost 2:3 (1:3) to Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which sacked three coaches in the season, is relegated after five first division years.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which could not save itself with a 3:1 (2:1) at Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, who have been English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 Points is the highest score the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017/18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned the game for Liverpool on Sunday.
wn.de.700458.22: "It was an extraordinary season for this wonderful club," said goal scorer van Dijk after the game, "that should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses should also be satisfied in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were interrupted from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there was even discussion about an early termination or a staging of the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played to the end without any special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: Violent clashes broke out during the night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police took violent action against participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Jerusalem on Sunday night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: The police used water cannons, among other things, to disperse the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu were also arrested, reported the news website "ynet".
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the Prime Minister's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to police reports, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray from a moving car on demonstrators on the roadside.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a stabbing attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of hasty relaxations and a lack of preparation for a second Corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The Corona crisis has severely affected the country's economy.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate has recently been more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel has recently risen to record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Transporter crashes into car - Nine injured - Ruhrgebiet - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen caused nine minor injuries.
bild.254850.3: A car driver was driving with her two children (3, 5) towards Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "She probably braked suddenly because she wanted to turn".
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three occupants in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after suspected Corona case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to ward off the coronavirus as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now, for the first time, the country is reporting a suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Due to a first official suspected Corona case in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a major city for fear of a disaster.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite strict epidemiological defenses in the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The Communist leadership declared the highest level of alert.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: According to its own statements, North Korea had not registered a single infection and described its defensive measures as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: Symptoms of the disease were reportedly detected in an "outlier" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person fled to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: There was initially no confirmation from South Korea for the border crossing within the four-kilometer-wide and largely mined military buffer zone.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, according to reports from the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea's military admitted the possibility of an illegal border crossing to North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were underway on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: According to its own statements, North Korea called an emergency meeting of the Politburo of the Workers' Party chaired by ruler Kim Jong Un on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive disaster".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday as a preventive measure to "completely block Kaesong and isolate each district and the region from others," it said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned and all people in Kaesong who had contact with her were quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The central military commission of the party is to investigate the "runaway case" as well as the behavior of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that about 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension ahead of Council meeting: City East and noise protection up for discussion before big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the major project Downtown Development East," says the central section of the city press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4.30 p.m. in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all, however, the upgrading of the eastern city is controversially discussed until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are narrow, most recently in individual committees even negative depending on their presence.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed by the citizens and then by the administration and municipal council fail after almost ten years of preparation, criticized project opponent Reinhard Klein as "extra-parliamentary opposition," "unsuspecting," "speculation," "denigration" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," says Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the Pforzheim citizens' list.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the treaties, he is in this position: "I know what I am talking about".
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit is cheaper for the city, contrary to statements by the city administration, the Technical Town Hall is to be renovated for 8.5 million euros after subsidies, of whose existence Klein is convinced.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop quite differently than is predicted in the town hall and by the supporters from the economy.
pz-news.de.72354.10: Shaping the city through his own efforts and not an investor: that is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP/FW/UB/LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It also essentially envisages the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, keeping the Schloßberg open, renting the ex-Thale for administrative space and, ideally, a smaller-scale downtown redesign with local sponsors.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: Environmental issues will also play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the Pforzheim population from health noise pollution caused by road traffic, including many speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local traffic club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of speed 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen, because they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting regular bus traffic with thinned-out cycles and by little commitment to cycling, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the energy and climate protection agency Pforzheim/Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: The agenda also includes accession to the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the redefinition of parental contributions in municipal day care facilities and the application for inclusion in federal smart city funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed Corona protections.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on July 31 with a delay of almost half a year.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operation, the first test drives were due.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: The Corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from making his first business trip in Grasser Racing's new Lamborghini Huracan for a long time.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old Langenargen completed his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his premiere in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With the ABS, for example, you have to go into corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was a lot of fun".
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite his only 25 years, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and was able to help his new team-mate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series also brings new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get along brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring".
schwaebische.de.113555.15: Right there - at the Lausitzring - the GT Masters will also hold its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From July 31, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015 he was last a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track much," says Zimmermann, who starts for the Friedrichshafen racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally to be fast".
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is will become clear in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play poker a little during the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring".
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current situation is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: Ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will take up the GT steering wheel at the Nürburgring in mid-August.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Transport Minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: According to press reports, the British government's decision to quarantine holidaymakers in Spain for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister cold.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Accordingly, Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rising Corona numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry is possible without quarantine requirements.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to be quarantined after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: However, the regulation does not apply to those who are just on the holiday deadline until Saturday, August 1, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is still considered one of the "safe countries" in Austria for which no quarantine is required in Austria.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Numerous ministers may have known in advance that there is a possibility that a quarantine will be imposed on holidaymakers in Spain," commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently no one bothered to say Grant Shapps".
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Almost a month after the end of the Corona emergency in Spain and the expiry of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists blame nightlife for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the British people's favourite holiday destinations.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government currently advises against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, excluding the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: On Navy Day in his country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that warships will be equipped with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, which are unique in the world, would expand the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces, Putin said on Sunday at the central naval parade in St. Petersburg.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defense also informed about successful tests of the Zirkon hypersonic missile built for the navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 metres per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater Tropedeo continues to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will continue on the nuclear-equipped underwater torpedo Poseidon, it was said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also sailed a military boat, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet units of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: The navy has been reliably protecting Russia for 300 years, Putin said at the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: Naval forces also celebrated Navy Day with parades in many other Russian coastal towns.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at an arms show in the Mediterranean port of Tartu.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video published by the Ministry of Defense showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help made more difficult due to Corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rainfall are now threatening parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center of the US climate agency NOAA announced on Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The Corona pandemic rampant in Texas is complicating the work of aid workers, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is an enormous challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the cyclone in Texas, he added, "This challenge is complicated and exacerbated when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most affected area of the state by Covid-19".
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died as a result of the Corona pandemic in Texas alone.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to exercise caution.
tt.com.149061.11: You should not disregard practices "to which we have become accustomed," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It is important that everyone keeps their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms were also provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: Corona should also be tested in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: According to authorities, "Hanna" hit land on the island of Padre Island directly off the Texas coast with wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to a hurricane of the lowest level one.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was initially issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown, while "Hanna" moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane "Douglas" was heading towards Hawaii during the night to Sunday with wind speeds of around 150 kilometres per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it will be near the largest islands in Hawaii on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average active hurricane season this year, according to a May forecast.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes can be expected, of which up to six could become very strong cyclones, the agency had explained.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season was only 30 percent, and that of a below-average season was only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote via Twitter that his government was closely monitoring the storms and was in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: Video assistant "punishes" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolos Filip Djuricic were denied two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals denied: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch black evening at the 0:2 (0:1) at SSC Napoli in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the video assistant of the referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of not given gates for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR been so harsh against a team," commented the "Corriere dello Sport".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Naples had taken the lead in the 8th minute with a goal from full-back Elseid Hisaj, in the 32nd minute Filip Djuricic first cheered the equalizer.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) withdrew the goal due to an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The goals of attackers Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) were also taken back by the referee team following advice from the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In injury time Allan made the 2-0 final score for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a speed trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology is setting records," writes the "Gazzetta dello Sport".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began with a setback for double winner FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who recovered "reasonably well" after a short vacation and a few days of training, has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to his left foot and threatens to miss decisive premier class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In the bad weather in Munich, the right-back broke off a training game and was driven off the course with a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to take a break in the fight for the title is an open question.
wn.de.700404.7: An appearance in the second round match against Chelsea FC on 8 August will be difficult, the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: Bayern do not want to be stopped by the mishap from training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick mentioned the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: His victory-hungry title collectors should show quality, intensity and concentration in the ideally following 28 days until the premier class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: "We have mastered the mandatory tasks with championship and cup simply excellently.
wn.de.700404.12: Now it is time to create something special," said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until Munich can deal with the final tournament and previously a training camp in the Algarve, the round of 16 obligation against Chelsea FC is on the agenda.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3-0 in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners should not become a Bayern nightmare again in their home arena as in the lost "final at home" in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and build trust with a good game," demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to set the mood is scheduled for Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days of vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Straße, including the new players around Edel-Einkauf Leroy Sané, who met all his new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Like all newcomers, Leroy fitted in well," reported Flick.
wn.de.700404.21: Instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer only allowed to train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, team strength is now being trained for the Londoners, who, unlike the Flick ensemble, are in rhythm.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, Munich could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, in the semi-final Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin are possible opponents.
wn.de.700404.24: A way to the final in Lisbon "is not that easy," stressed the head coach, who can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday onwards.
wn.de.700404.25: The World Cup record goal scorer Klose and Flick know from many a joint tournament preparation, which is particularly important in the 0-to-100 preparation.
wn.de.700404.26: Working with his current team is "a pleasure," praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive trait of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including Thiago, who wanted to emigrate, and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts beyond the premier class season are not guaranteed.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise to award the World Championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: However, all American races were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Racing calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten Grand Prix confirmed so far, three more race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, races will be held at the Nürburgring in Germany and Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On November 1, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for World Championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: According to the current status, the 2020 race calendar thus includes 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased that we continue to make great progress in finalizing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar will be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November before the already officially planned races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the Formula 1 regulations require at least races on three continents for the award of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents will be raced, there will be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles citing "extraordinary circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming Corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: Moreover, Formula 1 will not be visiting America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense Corona situation, the races in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being back with them next season," Carey said.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: The number of infections in the São Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: Moreover, the concerns of some teams not wanting to drive in Brazil would not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known latenight show via video and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US late-night show via video.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her fight against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil look" during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - In the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless efforts for the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known latenight show about her plans for the future as well as her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight host Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to steer the focus away from the climate crisis," she was shocked.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: She experienced "everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children take to the streets".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She finds heads of state and leading politicians who mock her on social media or even try to silence her "funny" because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview, when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitter look after US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the UN Climate Summit 2019 in New York, for which the actress sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was caught by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, an animated image that ultimately became one of the most frequently used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she answered only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick answer and briefly disappeared from the picture laughing.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.

mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: after a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Blues rock guitarist Peter Green has now died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drug junkie, cult follower: the co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members announced in an official statement on Saturday, and a further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: In an emotional reaction, Mick Fleetwood spoke of a "monumental loss" for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, and his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" remains unforgotten to this day.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The life of the musician ("The End Of The Game," "In The Skies") resembled a rollercoaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: Green experienced a rapid rise with Fleetwood Mac - but the band celebrated their greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: There is said to have been a dispute, among other things, because Green wanted to donate all profits of the group to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Mental problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Just three years after its formation, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: Green was treated in psychiatry for a long time.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: For much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived temporarily on the street, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a working-class Jewish family in Bethnal Green, London.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: At a young age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. king and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned his first guitar chords.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: The teenager began playing guitar professionally at the age of 15 and five years later got the chance to perform on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Shortly afterwards, he was hired as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton at the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the middle of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross" composed by Green gave the group their first number 1 hit in the winter of 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: The rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that has happened to me in life is the drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit".
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved a respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile Fleetwood Mac swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Her 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of fellow musicians.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British Daily Telegraph spoke of a rock star who had returned to Earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band disbanded in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his soft sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
